articles.content: At one time Motorola was as good as it got for Android updates, at times beating even Google’s own phones to the punch. That was back when Nexus phones were a thing, though, and a whole lot has chang… [+2780 chars]

articles.content: Samsung is gearing up to launch new Galaxy Buds Pro earbuds, which are likely set to debut in January alongside the new Galaxy S21 smartphones. The new headphones have a feature that's quite similar … [+1675 chars]

articles.title: Download Wallpapers From the Not-Yet-Announced Samsung Galaxy S21 - Lifehacker
articles.description: Samsung has not even announced the Galaxy S21—its not-so-secret future flagship device—yet the smartphone’s wallpapers have already been leaked and are available for download right now.

articles.title: Intel, AMD shares continue declines after report on Microsoft's in-house chip plans - Seeking Alpha
